snippet.title: Ghostrunner 2 Pre-Order Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
Ghostrunner 2 launches October 26, 2023, on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, EPIC Games, GOG, and Steam! Watch the new trailer and pre-order Ghostrunner 2 now. Upgrade to Brutal Edition for 48-hour early access and bonus features. 

Pre-order Store links:
Steam: https://505.games/GR2Steam
PlayStation 5: https://505.games/GR2PS5
Xbox Series X|S: https://505.games/GR2Xbox
GOG: https://505.games/GR2GOG
EPIC: https://505.games/GR2EPIC

The new trailer features new gameplay and some of the incredible action and bosses you will encounter in Ghostrunner 2. 

Set one year after the critically acclaimed sci-fi smash, Ghostrunner 2 sees cyber ninja protagonist Jack emerging from the deathtrap of Dharma Tower for the first time to explore the sprawling wasteland beyond. 

Featuring intense fast-paced-push-forward combat, and deeply challenging gameplay, the sequel promises to up the ante from the original in every conceivable way, including, for the first time, motorcycle combat. 

Bursting with new powers, upgradeable abilities, traversal mechanics, an expanded narrative, deeper world building, and devilish new enemies, Ghostrunner 2 is the ultimate power fantasy… every kill will be earned. Adapt to, and master the gameplay as only a cyber ninja would. 

Be under no illusion…. blood will run. Accompanied by a killer synthwave soundtrack.

Chat live with the Ghostrunner 2 community on Discord: https://discord.gg/ghostrunner 

Follow on Social Media: 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/ghostrunnerthegame 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GhostrunnerGame 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/ghostrunner_game 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GhostrunnerOfficial

Stay up to date with the latest news from these 505 Games lands by following us across our community channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Instagram: https://instagram.com/505_games
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/505games
Blog: https://505games.com/blog/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/505-games/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/505games
